mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inp_no AS "inpNo", a.shouqianzhenduan AS "shouqianzhenduan", a.bingqing AS "bingqing", a.geli AS "geli", a.jizhen AS "jizhen", a.yuyue_date AS "yuyueDate", a.shoushu_grade AS "shoushuGrade", a.shoushushi AS "shoushushi", a.shoushujian AS "shoushujian", a.shoushu_doctor AS "shoushuDoctor", a.zhushounone AS "zhushounone", a.zhushoutwo AS "zhushoutwo", a.zhushouthree AS "zhushouthree", a.zhushoufour AS "zhushoufour", a.mazuifangfa AS "mazuifangfa", a.mazuiyishi AS "mazuiyishi", a.zhushou AS "zhushou", a.gongxueyishi AS "gongxueyishi", a.beizhu AS "beizhu", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_operation_apply a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT
FROM doc_operation_apply a
a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM doc_operation_apply a
a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_operation_apply( id, inp_no, shouqianzhenduan, bingqing, geli, jizhen, yuyue_date, shoushu_grade, shoushushi, shoushujian, shoushu_doctor, zhushounone, zhushoutwo, zhushouthree, zhushoufour, mazuifangfa, mazuiyishi, zhushou, gongxueyishi, beizhu, create_date, update_date, update_by, remark, create_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inpNo}, #{shouqianzhenduan}, #{bingqing}, #{geli}, #{jizhen}, #{yuyueDate}, #{shoushuGrade}, #{shoushushi}, #{shoushujian}, #{shoushuDoctor}, #{zhushounone}, #{zhushoutwo}, #{zhushouthree}, #{zhushoufour}, #{mazuifangfa}, #{mazuiyishi}, #{zhushou}, #{gongxueyishi}, #{beizhu}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{del_flag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_operation_apply SET inp_no = #{inpNo}, shouqianzhenduan = #{shouqianzhenduan}, bingqing = #{bingqing}, geli = #{geli}, jizhen = #{jizhen}, yuyue_date = #{yuyueDate}, shoushu_grade = #{shoushuGrade}, shoushushi = #{shoushushi}, shoushujian = #{shoushujian}, shoushu_doctor = #{shoushuDoctor}, zhushounone = #{zhushounone}, zhushoutwo = #{zhushoutwo}, zhushouthree = #{zhushouthree}, zhushoufour = #{zhushoufour}, mazuifangfa = #{mazuifangfa}, mazuiyishi = #{mazuiyishi}, zhushou = #{zhushou}, gongxueyishi = #{gongxueyishi}, beizhu = #{beizhu}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remark = #{remark}, del_flag = #{del_flag} WHERE id = #{id}
